Headline: #49B North Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Balmoral
ShortDescription: 49B North Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Balmoral.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49B North Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Balmoral.

Allow extra travel time.
